roleset.name: to live in or as if in a camp

example.name: intransitive
example.text: He camped out at a high-tech nerve center on the floor of the Big Board , where he could watch updates on prices and pending stock orders [*T*-1] .
example.arg: at a high-tech nerve center on the floor of the Big Board , where he could watch updates on prices and pending stock orders [*T*-1]

roleset.note: Frames file for 'camp' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

roleset.name: camp (non-phrasal)

example.name: intransitive
example.text: We-1 went *PRO*-1 camping and put them together in the car .

example.name: Both args
example.text: Mary camped in a tent in John's back yard.
example.arg: in a tent in John's back yard.

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT. Member of VNcls lodge-46.
